executable.title: Compute Tube Graph Probability (TubeTK)
executable.description: Propagates averaged information of a (mean) graph to the current graph based on connectivity information.
executable.acknowledgements: This work is part of the TubeTK project at Kitware.

file.name: inGraphFile
file.label: Input Graph File
file.description: Input graph file. Filename serves as base for output files, .matProb.txt, .cntProb.txt, .brcProb.txt.
